definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Requires operator to re-enter user name and password before an action is taken.
sentences.chinese: 运营商需要重新输入用户名和密码之前采取行动。

sentences.english: With 5G, carriers could also deliver super-sharp 4K video to the home.
sentences.chinese: 通过5G，运营商可以向住户家提供高清4K视频。

sentences.english: But the wind business is new to Exelon, the nation's largest operator of nuclear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 而风业务是新艾斯，全国最大的核电站运营商。

sentences.english: Creating a transcontinental wireless operator seems to make sense.
sentences.chinese: 创造洲际无线运营商好像是有意义的。

sentences.english: " Android's success can be attributed to "communication service providers' marketing and vendor support," Gartner said.
sentences.chinese: 而安卓的成功则要归功于运营商和供货商的支持。

sentences.english: Calendering process operators perform some or all of the following duties.
sentences.chinese: 压延处理运营商执行部分或全部下列职责。

sentences.english: The operators of one of the old terminals bought a tiny one in a nearby town.
sentences.chinese: 旧机场的一家运营商在附近的城镇买了一个小型航站。

sentences.english: Hotelier fortunes sway with the broader economy.
sentences.chinese: 酒店运营商的财运常常随着整体经济而波动。

sentences.english: The operator is Great Bay Aquaculture, a fish-farming company.
sentences.chinese: 运营商是大湾水产养殖，鱼类养殖公司。

sentences.english: You can hate the wireless carriers all you want.
sentences.chinese: 你可以随心所欲地憎恨那些无线运营商。

sentences.english: It is typically favored by large industrial SCR operators.
sentences.chinese: 这是典型的青睐大型工业可控硅运营商。

sentences.english: That will be a completely new way of doing business for cellular providers.
sentences.chinese: 对移动电话运营商而言，这将是一种全新的生意途径。

sentences.english: China launches probe into alleged graft at telcos.
sentences.chinese: 政府发起对电信运营商高管的反腐调查。

sentences.english: Mobile telecom carrier can formulate their own standard of the charge within above-mentioned standards.
sentences.chinese: 移动运营商可以在上述标准以内，制定具体收费标准。

sentences.english: She said they were just operators who lacked conviction.
sentences.chinese: 她说他们只是运营商却缺乏说服力。

sentences.english: How do Mobile Carriers bill data usage - by byte or by packet?
sentences.chinese: 如何移动运营商账单数据使用的字节或数据包？

definition: China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通

pinyin: yi2 dong4 tong1 xin4 wang3 luo4
